description:
This guide teaches you how to install Mattermost on the Rocky Linux 9 server. Mattermost is an open-source and self-hosted messaging system for your organization. It is an alternative to services like Slack and Microsoft Teams.

The post How to Install Mattermost on Rocky Linux 9 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Mattermost on Rocky Linux 9

description:
In this guide, you'll learn how to monitor MySQL/MariaDB servers with Prometheus and Grafana.

The post How to Monitor MySQL or MariaDB with Prometheus and Grafana appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Monitor MySQL or MariaDB with Prometheus and Grafana
